column2: Linker| 130 | You may expend this item as you clear stress from ~ShipSystem~. Remove all other stress cards of the same value (regardless of their position in the stack)
FailureFuse | 40 | The next time ~ShipSystem~ would lose stress tolerance (due to breakage), you may instead sacrifice the failure fuse.
Perfect Piece |~CardValue~2 | While in the Engine bay, you may expend this tool to remove the ~CardValue~1 of ~CardSuit~1 without using up any time. (You must still wait for your turn to use this)

Devil’s fire Rocket Fuel | 50 | Your pilot may expend this fuel while using thrust to gain +5 on their manuever roll. At the end of their turn, your engineer must draw a stress card, and if it is a spade, add it to the engine.

External Sensor Array | 60 | A pile of junky external sensors. Can be dumped onto the battlefield (By your systems Hub) in order to grant a +4 perception bonus to your Coms center for the rest of the battle.
Additional Air | 200 | If your Life support goes down, your systems hub may expend this item to buy your crew an additional two turns (Doing so uses their turn)
Power cells | 500 | Your systems hub may expend this item to gain an additional 4 power for one turn.
St.Christopher Totem | 800 | Kept on the pilots Desk. May be expended in response to any card draw or dice roll anywhere on the ship to force an instant redraw/reroll of that dice/card.

St.Christopher amulet | 250 | Worn by any single player. During ship combat, may be expended in response to any card draw or dice roll in the same room as the wearer to force an instant redraw/reroll of that dice/card.
~ShipSystem~  upgrade | ~UpgradeAmount~2 * ~UpgradeMax~2  | Increase your ~ShipSystem~  stress tolerance by ~UpgradeAmount~1, up to a maximum of ~UpgradeMax~1
~ShipLifeSupportReplaceName~ | ~FreshStressTolerance~2*~LifeSystemSpecial~2 | A fresh replacement Life support system. Stress Tolerance ~FreshStressTolerance~1 . ~LifeSystemSpecial~1
~ShipCompReplaceName~ | ~FreshStressTolerance~2*~CompSystemSpecial~2 | A fresh replacement Computer system. Stress Tolerance ~FreshStressTolerance~1 . ~CompSystemSpecial~1

~ShipPowerReplaceName~ | ~Powerlevel~2*~FreshStressTolerance~2*~PowerSystemSpecial~2 | A replacement ships power core. Stress Tolerance ~FreshStressTolerance~1 . Produces ~Powerlevel~1 Units of power. ~PowerSystemSpecial~1
~ShipEngineReplaceName~ | ~FreshStressTolerance~2*~EngineSystemSpecial~2 | A Replacement Engine system for a ship. Stress Tolerance ~FreshStressTolerance~1 . ~EngineSystemSpecial~1
System recovers twice as quickly once back on line (IE, you recover two points worth of environment whenever this is online)
Ship automatically clears all poisonous gases from all rooms at all times.
Gain a +2 bonus to all Gardening checks made for Resident Hearthoak seeds on the ship.
Gain a +2 bonus on all medical checks made within your ship, +4 within the medical bay.
Deep Space: This power supply is designed to run indefinitely, even during the long voyages of deep intersteller space.
``Second hand’’ : You get the feeling this system had a previous owner. You get the feeling they might want it back.
System can be safely reset as soon as stress is reduced to just one card (Regardless of the cards value)
Fragile system. Whenever this system breaks, it loses TWO points of stress tolerance.
Bug Free: all Jacks dealt to this system are immediately discarded.
Safety Dampening: If this card is dealt multiple stress cards in the same turn, discard the lowest valued card.
Finicky. The Engineering checks to remove cards from this system are 3 higher than usual.
Finicky as all heck. The Engineering checks to remove cards from this system are 8 higher than usual.
Blackmarket: You must have ``Blackmarket Contacts’’ In order to purchase this item. ~GeneralSystemBonus
Improved Targeting computer: Your artillerly and point defence gain a +2 bonus on all attack rolls while this system is online.
Panoptican Sensor Array: Your communications officier gains a +2 bonus on Perception checks when using this system.
Mandlebrot Encryption: Gain a +5 on computing checks used to send encrypted Messeges
Hardened Electronics: If your system is hit by a EMP, or similar external damage, your Computers have a 50% chance of being uneffected.
``The Globe’’ Media hub: Gain +2 on all social checks made through the communcations center of your ship.
``Sacred ground’’: the DC on all computing checks made to hack or otherwise infiltrate your system goes up by 10
``Alexandria’’: Your ship now contains an electronic library. Gain a +1 bonus on all research checks to use this library.
HAL: This computer system is possesed by a questionably helpful AI, which will definitely not turn on you.
EMP Resistant: If this system would be hit by an EMP it has a 50% chance of being uneffected.
Automated Transition: Whenever this system goes down, Emergency power is activated immediately, coming online in time for the start of your logistics hubs’ turn.
Shield Adapted: The power suply of this generator is particular well suited for powering shield- all shields cost one power unit less.
Radioactive: Every week spent sharing a ship with this Power supply, roll a fortitude save (DC 15). If you fail, you lost 1 hp, permanently.
Deep Space: This power supply is designed to run indefinitely, even during the long voyages of deep intersteller space.
Triple cautious: No matter what happens, no matter what, this reactor will always shutdown safetly. It will never leak radiation or explode. No matter what.
Spitting sparks: Whenever you fail in an attempt to remove stress from this system, you take 2d4 electric damage.
Burning Tail: if fired in the direction of an enemy while at distance one, deal severe (Damage catagory 4) damage to the facing side of their ship.
Slipshift: Grant your pilot +2 on all manuvering checks.
ipshift: Grant your pilot +2 on all manuvering checks
Overload Friendly: Whenever an engineer uses ``Overload engine’’ with this engine, they need only draw two stress cards.
Fiery temper: Whenever you fail in an attempt to remove stress from this engine, you take 2d4 fire damage.
This engine is equiped with a hypostatic jump drive (In addition to normal thrust). Activating the drive requires 30 units of power, a trained pilot, and nerves of steel.

Explosive: Each time this engine fails, the GM rolls a 1d10 to determine if it explodes (Explodes on a 1). On an explosion, deal 3d6 shrapenel and 3d6 fire damage to everyone in the engine bay (Reflex DC 15 to escape).
Fine Control: Your pilot gains +4 on all piloting checks for docking manuevers, and other checks requiring fine control.
Gyro Upgrade | 800 | Your Gyro now draws one additional power, but your ships effective weight is reduced by 3 (due to the more powerful gyro)
Kitchen Decor| 160 | ~KitchenDecor~. Install on your space ship to gain a +1 bonus on all sooth and entertain checks made against guests to your ship.

Commanders Throne| 120 | An impressive Leather throne, perfect for any war room. Install in your spaceship (or otherwise permanent base of operations). Anyone sitting in the throne gains +2 to Command checks.
Workshop supplies | 550 | Extra supplies for the workshop room on your spaceship. Grants +2 to all engineering(Repair) checks, craft checks and Bulletsmithing conducted aboard your ship.
Medical Bay upgrades | 550 | Grants a +3 bonus to all medical checks done inside your medical bay.
~EngineCoolName~ | ~CoolantFilter~2*~CoolantPower~2 | Ship modification. Requires ~CoolantPower~1 . While running, automatically discard any ~CoolantFilter~1 of spades drawn to ship stress.

~PowerCoolName~ | ~CoolantFilter~2*~CoolantPower~2 | Ship modification. Requires ~CoolantPower~1 units of energy to run. While running, automatically discard any ~CoolantFilter~1 of diamonds drawn to ship stress.
Bunk Beds | 250 | Can be used to convert a single room in your ship into a two person bedroom.
Towline | 325 | A massive sturdy ship’s towline. Suitable for hauling ships of similar size, or small asteroids.
Faraday Shielding | 450 | External farady shielding- will prevent all incoming electric damage, but also increases your ships weight by 3 (making it harder to turn)
False Flag | 2500 | Alternative markings for the side of youe ship, flying it under a different registration, port and name. BLACKMARKET ITEM: Only those with blackmarket contacts may purchase this.
Adaptive Aircushions | 1800| Requires 3 units of power. Whenver your ship would be knocked around, if this device is active, prevent all damage your crew would take from being thrown around.
Padded interior | 220 |Whenver your ship would be knocked around, prevent the first 3 damage each crew mate would recieve from being knocked against sharp objects. (This protection is permanent)

Lieutenant’s terminal | 700 | An extra terminal, to be placed in any single room on your spaceship. Occupants of this room may ``Delegate’’ (use line of sight or voice based abilities) as if they were in the Coms center. Requires 1 unit of Power to keep running.

Speakers and Stage | 3500 | Curtains and building supplies to turn any large storeroom/ loading bay in your spaceship into a theatre/ music venue. Various Craft and social checks will be needed to actual implement the installation (unless you hire professionals)
An assortment of wonderful knick-knacks for zero G kitchens
Homely Wooden Shelves, spice racks, and tableware, suitable for making any spaceship mess feel like a real home.
Sharp, colourful shelving units, foldable utilities and zero-G cutlery. The very best in convienence and comfort.
Acoustic padding| 450 | Install in a single room (Probably a theatre or throne room) to grant all speakers in that room +2 command and entertain.
